RAMDCGREE ce F     mae COBDS  “OF DELAWARE BAR OmeT  T am writing in response to the questions you raised at Tuesday's Senate Commerce Committee hearing about remarks  article asserts that I warned the industry “might return te  The  practices such as cartoon advertising if Congress fails te grant protection from lawsuits.” As the attached transcript shows, this was a completely inaccurate account of the remarks I made.  On February 17, I met with a group of reporters to discuss the industry’s position regarding the civil liability pravisions of the proposed tobacco resolution. Along with many Constitutional scholars, we believe that many of the advertising and markering restrictions conrained in the June 20 proposed resolution cannot be implemented without industry agreement because of Constitutional protections. The purpose of the briefing was to educate reporters about this marter and also to  862265989
